update role
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

creator_code = #{creatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_code = #{creatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bak01 = #{bak01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak02 = #{bak02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak03 = #{bak03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak04 = #{bak04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak05 = #{bak05,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
